issues.description: Counter will overflow without bounds checking
suggestions: Add overflow check: 'if count < 15 then count <= count + 1; end if;'
Reset counter when it reaches maximum value
issues.reasoning: Counter will wrap around from 15 to 0, which may not be the intended behavior.

suggestions: Add overflow output port to signal when counter wraps around
Add carry output to indicate when maximum count is reached
issues.reasoning: External logic may need to know when counter overflows for proper system operation.

issues.description: Enable signal not synchronized with clock
suggestions: Synchronize enable signal with clock to avoid metastability
issues.reasoning: Asynchronous enable signal can cause metastability issues.
